    • Uses of Device in fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

      Subinterfaces of Device in fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ApplicationDevice
      Represents a device which is visible (can be used) by an application.
      interface  AvailableDevice
      It represents an available device.
      interface  KnownDevice
      Represents a device which is known by the device manager.
      interface  ProvidedDevice
      All devices which provides this service will be discovered by the device manager.
